en.title: Official Appointment
en.content: FusionExcel is pleased to announce the official appointment of International Badminton Champion, Foo Kok Keong, as FusionExcel International Sports Advisor for our amazing Quantum Pendant. Foo Kok Keong's personal experiences and endorsement of FE's Quantum Pendant will take FusionExcel to the next level of growth. Welcome, Foo Kok Keong! Click Here to Read Foo Kok Keong's Testimonial

meta.description: FusionExcel is pleased to announce the official appointment of International Badminton Champion, Foo Kok Keong, as FusionExcel International Sports Advisor for our amazing Quantum Pendant. Foo Kok Keong's personal experiences and endorsement of FE's Quantum Pendant will take FusionExcel to the next level of growth. Welcome, Foo Kok Keong!
meta.author: klhunter

bm.title: FusionExcel Welcomes Overseas Members at Headquarter 03rd July 2009.

meta.description: FE welcomes around 300 overseas members with a buffet lunch at HQ on Friday 03rd July 2009. The overseas members were in Malaysia to attend FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner at MAEPS the following day. Many of them are newcomers and are very impressed with FE's setup at HQ. FE hope the overseas members will return to their respective countries with fond memories and spread the good word around about what they saw and experienced at FE's HQ.
meta.author: klhunter
